actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and Finance.

official_title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to strengthen the reporting obligations of registered companies and their auditors under that Act.
short_title: Financial Fraud Detection and Disclosure Act

summary.text: Financial Fraud Detection and Disclosure Act - Amends the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934 to establish fraud detection and disclosure requirements for public accountants performing audits of an issuer's financial statements.

titles.title: Financial Fraud Detection and Disclosure Act
To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to strengthen the reporting obligations of registered companies and their auditors under that Act.
